name: Splunk Agent
description: An AI agent that provides capabilities to perform Splunk operations including log searches, alert management, and system monitoring.

skills.name: Splunk Agent Skill
skills.description: Handles tasks related to Splunk log searches, alerts, detectors, and system monitoring.
examples: Search for error logs in the last 24 hours
Create an alert for high CPU usage
Get system status and health metrics

examples.title: Search Application Logs
examples.description: Search for application-specific logs with error level
examples.query: Search for all error logs from the web application in the last hour

examples.title: Create Performance Alert
examples.description: Set up monitoring for system performance metrics
examples.query: Create an alert for when CPU usage exceeds 80% for more than 5 minutes

examples.title: System Health Check
examples.description: Get overall system status and health metrics
examples.query: Show me the current system health and any active alerts
